Clarity features LISP-link syntax â€” Lists within Lists.

exercises.name: Types: Primitives
exercises.hint:
Types are strictly enforced and cannot mix in Clarity.
Fix any kind of type mixing errors in primitives.
More here: https://book.clarity-lang.org/ch02-01-primitive-types.html
